title: wine_Mount_Eden_Vineyards_2013_Estate_Grown_Pinot_Noir_(Santa_Cruz_Mountains)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 82832.
country: US.
description: This wine is wound extremely tight, but opens like a lotus with decanting or overnight patience. Aromas of rose buds, black-raspberry extract, wet clay and dried purple flowers show on the nose, bolstered by the slightest smoky kiss of oak. Savory flavors of roasted black-plum skins and elderberry meet with soy, graphite and loam on the palate, which will gain amazing tertiary flavors with time. Drink 2018â€“2028..
designation: Estate Grown.
points: 95.
price: 62.0.
province: California.
region_1: Santa Cruz Mountains.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
